sentences.en: As one interviewee explains, even regular evaluation does not necessarily help.
sentences.cn: 一位被采访者解释说, 甚至定期评估也不一定起作用.

sentences.en: Chinese News ( Da Zhong Bao ) was also among interviewee's top 10 picks.
sentences.cn: 《大中报》 ( ChineseNews ) 也位于受华人欢迎的10种报纸之列.

sentences.en: Interviewee : Could you give us a brief account of your series?
sentences.cn: 记者: 能简单的谈一下你的这些作品 吗 ?

sentences.en: Interviewee: Do the new staff have to do everything?
sentences.cn: 职员: 事情全是新员工做 吗 ?

sentences.en: Interviewee: If there is a position opening , could I apply for it?
sentences.cn: 职员: 如果领导职位有空缺, 我可以参与竞争吗啊?

sentences.en: Interviewee: OK, are always welcome to my office. Have a good weekend.
sentences.cn: 好的, 随时欢迎你来我的办公室做客, 也祝你周末愉快.

sentences.en: Interviewee: Would I have to come to work on time?
sentences.cn: 职员: 那我需要准时上班 吗 ?

sentences.en: Interviewee: Would the company ever take us to travel?
sentences.cn: 职员: 公司会定期组织旅游 吗 ?

sentences.en: Is there any interviewee who stands out as memorable?
sentences.cn: 参加面试的人中有没有特别值得注意的？

sentences.en: It is counter-productive to address an interviewee in patronizing tones.
sentences.cn: 以盛气凌人的语气同面试者讲话将会适得其反。

sentences.en: Overusing restatement , which can be distracting to the interviewee.
sentences.cn: 过多重述回答将使被访谈者分心.

sentences.en: The interviewee didn't want to dwell on bad experiences.
sentences.cn: 受访者不想对那些糟糕的经历谈得太多.

sentences.en: The success depends on good rapport between interviewer and interviewee.
sentences.cn: 成功取决于采访者与被采访者之间的良好沟通。

sentences.en: What questions will an interviewer ask an interviewee usually?
sentences.cn: 考官往往会问应试者什么问题?

sentences.en: Your notepad is best kept out of the interviewee line of vision.
sentences.cn: 最好将笔记本放在被访谈者视线外.

sentences.en: Your notepad is best kept out of the interviewee's line of vision.
sentences.cn: 最佳将笔记本放在被访谈者视线外.

words.tran_cn: 会见者；面谈者；进行面试者
采访；接见；对…进行面谈；对某人进行面试

trans.tran_en: the person who answers the questions in an interview
